original_title: Water, Not Weapons: The Greening of Afghanistan
overview: Dr. Tetsu Nakamura was a humanitarian who devoted his life to rebuilding Afghanistan, up until the day he was tragically killed on December 4, 2019. This documentary tells the story of his tireless efforts to bring water, agriculture and civilization to the people of a war-torn nation.
title: Water, Not Weapons: The Greening of Afghanistan
